page.title: 20THE POPULATION OF NEWHAVEN
page.content: The population of Newhaven is 10,697 (1981 census). The percentage of males in the population is 48.5% with the remaining 51.5% being females. Nearly 20% (18.9%) of the population is of pensionable age (i.e. over 60 years). A further 21% is in the age range 0-15 years. Of all the residents in Newhaven, only 6.6% have been born outside the United Kingdom. Newhaven has not had much growth in recent times. Modern housing development is taking place in the Valley Estate to the North West of Newhaven and town flats have been erected in the centre of the old residential area. The pupils of 1C, Tideway School, Newhaven, 1984-85, collected this information helped by their teachers, Miss Butlin, Mrs Ridge and Mrs Davis. Mrs Wood assisted with the data entry.
